post.body: I usually enter plays the next morning, but seldom have time for anything else then.
I do ratings like once every 6 months or so
these are all new ones
It's a lot of game for the price!
@verkisto The theme of "random medieval word"?
Part of being a Real True Christian is not just knowing WHO to hate, but WHEN to hate them.
The Doctor-on-Doctor action was great. The general plot, much less so.
GEEKS CAUGHT IN RUNNING SOMETHING THEY LIKE INTO THE FUCKING GROUND SCANDAL!
Needs a wolf on it.
As if future generations are even going to remember this movie.
It's a SUPER tree!
Finished reading the book the other night...you're not wrong. "Say, who's the dead guy in the bed? And where am I?"
Dave Thiel brings te Christmas Lulz: http://tinyurl.com/5d3ery
Last night's games: Pitchcar, Dominion (x2), Arkadia
And now, since I obviously haven't played ENOUGH boardgames, off to play MORE!
#BGGratings that's it for this session! Thanks for not unfollowing me, non-boardgame fans!
#BGGratings Notre Dame: 7 -> 6
#BGGratings Tribune: 7
#BGGratings Tinners' Trail: 7
#BGGratings Stone Age: 8
#BGGratings Steel Driver: 8
#BGGratings Red November: 8
#BGGratings Power Grid - Korea/China: 8
#BGGratings Pitchcar: 8
#BGGratings Fast Flowing Forest Fellers: 7
#BGGratings Chicago Express (Wabash Cannonball): 5
#BGGratings Ave Caesar: 7
I go sleep now. ZZZzzzzzzzzzzzz
What has 28 legs, two heads, costs a bundle of cash, and will be in our house in 5-8 weeks or so?
Death Star break! Time to read instead!
Death Star progress: http://tinyurl.com/7vo4n7
Okay, hitting the sheets. Death Star is maybe 1/4-1/3 completed. Hopefully the Emperor will be forgiving.
Doctor Who Christmas Special Time!! Woooo!!!
Apparently this pic that I made last year is making the rounds. Yay! But pls credit! http://tinyurl.com/9lqm3f
RT: @mikesterling: BEHOLD: CONTENT THIEVERY - http://tinyurl.com/9xntx3 (taken from Dr. K: http://tinyurl.com/8xze5j)
Back from yummeh Christmas dinner, now downloading the Doctor Who Christmas special!
#legodeathstar Finished Step 17 (out of 190+), taking a break.
I fear that if I start on the Lego Death Star now, I won't want to stop for Christmas dinner!
Raise your hand if Santa/the wife brought you the Lego Death Star! (raises hand)
Merry Christmas, everyone!
